message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO 

Reasoning: The paper deals with the problem of reconstructing 3D shape and pose of an object from a single image, which is a core problem in computer vision. The paper proposes a new task of pose-aware shape reconstruction from a single image and advocates the use of cheaper 2D annotations of object silhouettes in natural images. The paper also proposes new architectures for pose-aware shape reconstruction. Based on these factors, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). Other likely sub-categories include cs.GR (Graphics), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.RO (Robotics).
